title: App Auto-Patch (xyz.techitout.appAutoPatch)
description: This will configure the settings for the App Auto-Patch tool

DaysUntilReset.title: Days Until Reset
DaysUntilReset.description: The number of days after the patching cadence start date (Zero Date) that the patching complete status will reset from TRUE to FALSE

PatchWeekStartDay.title: Patch Week Start Day
PatchWeekStartDay.description: The day of the week to force the patching cadence start date (Zero Date) to go back to in order to have the patch cadence start the same day of the week for all users

DeadlineCountFocus.title: Focus Count Deadline
DeadlineCountFocus.description: The maximum number of automatic deferrals allowed if the system is in user-enabled Focus/Do Not Disturb or when a process has requested that the display not go to sleep

DeadlineCountHard.title: Hard Count Deadline
DeadlineCountHard.description: The maximum number of user selected deferrals allowed before App Auto-Patch will no longer allow deferrals and will automatically patch when the timer expires

DeadlineDaysFocus.title: Focus Days Deadline
DeadlineDaysFocus.description: The maximum number of days that automatic deferrals are allowed if the system is in user-enabled Focus/Do Not Disturb or when a process has requested that the display not go to sleep

DeadlineDaysHard.title: Hard Days Deadline
DeadlineDaysHard.description: The maximum number of days deferrals allowed before App Auto-Patch will no longer allow deferrals and will automatically patch when the timer expires

DeferralTimerDefault.title: Deferral Timer Default
DeferralTimerDefault.description: The number of minutes to defer until the next update workflow attempt if a user choses not install updates

DeferralTimerError.title: Deferral Timer Error
DeferralTimerError.description: The number of minutes to defer if AAP detects an error in the workflow

DeferralTimerFocus.title: Deferral Timer Focus
DeferralTimerFocus.description: The number of minutes to defer the update restart dialog automatically if a process has prevented display sleep (for example, during an active meeting) or the user has Focus or Do Not Disturb enabled

DeferralTimerMenu.title: Deferral Timer Menu
DeferralTimerMenu.description: Display a deferral time pop-up menu in the non-deadline install dialog that allows the user to override the Deferral Timer Default timer

DeferralTimerWorkflowRelaunch.title: Deferral Timer Workflow Relaunch
DeferralTimerWorkflowRelaunch.description: Amount of time in minutes until AAP is relaunched after a workflow. This timer results in AAP acting as a permanent agent that checks for app updates on a regular basis

DialogOnTop.title: Dialog On Top
DialogOnTop.description: Forces the AAP dialogs to stay on top of all other windows

DialogTimeoutDeferral.title: Deferral Dialog Timeout
DialogTimeoutDeferral.description: Time given to the user to respond to deferral prompt if enabled

DialogTimeoutDeferralAction.title: Deferral Dialog Timeout Action
DialogTimeoutDeferralAction.description: What happens when the deferral timer expires

UnattendedExit.title: Unattended Exit
UnattendedExit.description: Deterines if the Dialog should automatically close after completion if there is no response from the end-user

UnattendedExitSeconds.title: Unattended Exit Seconds
UnattendedExitSeconds.description: The number of seconds the AAP dialog will automatically close if UnattendedExit is set to TRUE

UseOverlayIcon.title: Use Overlay Icon
UseOverlayIcon.description: Toggles swiftDialog to use an overlay icon

IgnoredLabels.title: Ignored Labels
IgnoredLabels.description: A space-separated list of Installomator labels to ignore for the AAP workflow. Supports wilddcards

RequiredLabels.title: Required Labels
RequiredLabels.description: a space-separated list of Installomator labels that are required, regardless if the app is installed or or the latest version. Supports wildcards.

OptionalLabels.title: Optional Labels
OptionalLabels.description: A space-separated list of optional Installomator labels. Labels in this category are only included if the app exists on the end-users device and will force install even if its the latest version. Does Not Support Wildcards

AppTitle.title: App Title
AppTitle.description: Allows you to customize the name of App Auto-Patch to something else

ConvertAppsInHomeFolder.title: Convert Apps In Home Folder
ConvertAppsInHomeFolder.description: This will convert any apps found in the users home folder to the /Applications folder

IgnoreAppsInHomeFolder.title: Ignore Apps In Home Folder
IgnoreAppsInHomeFolder.description: Ignore apps found in '/Users/'. If an update is found in '/Users/' and variable is set to false, the app will be updated into the application's default path

InstallomatorOptions.title: Installomator Options
InstallomatorOptions.description: A space-separated list of options to override default Installomator options (i.e., BLOCKING_PROCESS_ACTION=prompt_user NOTIFY=silent LOGO=appstore)

InstallomatorVersion.title: Installomator Version
InstallomatorVersion.description: Determines if the AAP script should use the Main (beta) or Release version of Installomator. The version from the Main branch typically includes more recent updates from PR's to fix issues or add new labels.

RemoveInstallomatorPath.title: Remove Installomator Path
RemoveInstallomatorPath.description: Remove Installomator after App Auto-Patch is completed

SupportTeamName.title: Support Team Name
SupportTeamName.description: For the Support Team details that display in the Help Message

SupportTeamEmail.title: Support Team Email
SupportTeamEmail.description: For the Support Team details that display in the Help Message

SupportTeamPhone.title: Support Team Phone
SupportTeamPhone.description: For the Support Team details that display in the Help Message

SupportTeamWebsite.title: Support Team Website
SupportTeamWebsite.description: For the Support Team details that display in the Help Message

WebhookFeature.title: Webhook Feature
WebhookFeature.description: Determines if Webhooks are sent when patching is completed

WebhookURLSlack.title: Slack Webhook URL
WebhookURLSlack.description: The Slack Webhook URL to use if WebhookFeature is set to TRUE

WebhookURLTeams.title: Teams Webhook URL
WebhookURLTeams.description: The Teams Webhook URL to use if WebhookFeature is set to TRUE

WorkflowDisableAppDiscovery.title: Disable App Discovery Workflow
WorkflowDisableAppDiscovery.description: Disables the discovery of applications that require patching. If a list of labels from a previous discovery exists, AAP will use that list for the workflow

WorkflowDisableRelaunch.title: Disable Relaunch Workflow
WorkflowDisableRelaunch.description: Disable the automatic relaunch of AAP after the current workflow successfully completes

WorkflowInstallNowPatchingStatusAction.title: Workflow Install Now Patching Status Action
WorkflowInstallNowPatchingStatusAction.description: Determines if the Patching Completion Status is set to true when using the --workflow-install-now trigger
